Text: What's actually disappointing, busterfelix, is that you didn't take five seconds to search before you cluttered up TPB by uploading this. iLife 06 was already available here and is being seeded. Uploading a duplicate diminishes the effectiveness of the original file and causes everyone's download speeds to be slower (in addition to the aforementioned clutter). So it's a GOOD thing that nobody else bothered to seed your upload -- you made a mistake in trying to provide it. Please take five seconds to search before you upload anything else. If it's here and well-seeded -- do NOT duplicate it.
